b'Ojarumaru Yakusoku no Natsu Ojaru to S: b'A short film introduces Semira, a strange boy who comes to play with Ojaru and his chums and bears a marked resemblance to a boy of the same name who spent a summer with the village elders when they were boys, long ago.\n\n(Source: AnimeVice)'
